awards.title: 1st Prize in SIC (2019)
awards.desc: Samsung Innovation Campus (2019) is a 10-day camp learning about programming. IDEATHON is held at the end of the camp to let students apply their knowledge.

awards.title: Silver Medal in TOI17
awards.desc: Silver Medal Award in 17th Thailand Olympiad in Informatics (2021). This award allows me to be accepted at Chulalongkorn University without any examination.
